subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Li is 0-5 against Williams with Carlos Rodriguez as her coach, but she has made progress. The two players, Nos. 1 and 2 in the world, will meet in Saturday’s Sony Open final.
snippet: Li is 0-5 against Williams with Carlos Rodriguez as her coach, but she has made progress. The two players, Nos. 1 and 2 in the world, will meet in Saturday’s Sony Open final.
